title: Mama Farm (2010) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Mama Farm (2010) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Keep the ranch running at all costs in Mama Farm, a colorful challenge where farming is only part of the fun.
Mimi's parents are on their way to visit grandma due to an illness and have left her in charge of the farm. It's not the first time this has happened to her, and it won't be the last, but it certainly not as easy as it seems. There's quite a bit of work involved and she has asked you for your help. 
Join Mimi in her attempt to keep things going while her parents are away. Manage the farm and deliver the orders within the time allowed. Mimi will have to grow and harvest crops, care for the livestock, and use machines to make products. Play mini-games, win trophies, and take care of culprits!

============================================
Main Features:                             =
============================================

- Maintain order on the farm in this fun Time Management endeavor.
- Help Mimi manage the ranch and deliver orders.
- Grow and harvest crops, care for livestock, and make products.
- Play mini-games, win trophies, and take care of culprits.

============================================
Instructions:                              =
============================================

* Install                                         ^_^
* Play
